title: Riot Support has confirmed that Renekton's W hitting separately is a bug. Why isn't it fixed yet?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
**For those of you who do not know, Renekton's W has been supposedly bugged.**


**Instead of applying all the damage and on-hit effects at once, it now deals the damage and on-hit per strike/over time.**



This is a pretty big change and it really changes how you gauge his burst and it ruins one of my fave builds: BotRK Renekton, which was actually surprisingly good on him, especially against HP stackers and it also helped him chase targets.


This bug massively diminishes Renekton's W damage combo with BotRK and it also makes his burst really confusing to gauge (which is important when you want to go for an all in later)


**Why hasn't this bug been fixed? If its intentional why wasn't it in any of the patch notes? This change is pretty big**

replies.body: We made this change intentionally in 6.14 . We don't patch note _everything_, but you are right this should have been called out. Sorry.

> We made this change intentionally in 6.14 . We don't patch note _everything_, but you are right this should have been called out. Sorry.

I dug around a bit regarding discussion for the 6.14 patch. People said it was to stop burst from the damage per hit mastery. 


Why is this an issue? Renektons not exactly in a super strong place atm and he isn't autoattack focused either. Its jist that extra bit of burst.


Also why does shyvanna get to keep it? Her q hits multiple times at once too. And shes actually autoattack based

i noticed it. i thought it was a bug. because i was fighting a renekt. and when i kind of. think in my head, how much damage more the empowered W does. i take more damage after an intial ammount. and i get surprised. i legitimately lost lane to a renekton few days ago because of that. took  my a while to farm up and win the game back tho.

but wait. why did you make his W like this. ?. if its intentional.
